title: Interlibrary Lending to Other Institutions: Libraries - Northwestern University
content: Most materials are loaned for a period of 10 weeks. Renewals are often granted for an additional 4 weeks upon request. BTAA and Ivy Plus libraries are granted a 16 week initial loan with 4 week renewals. Northwestern University Library (INU) lends the following materials: The following materials are available for scanning: The following materials are NOT available for loan: Use OCLC - Symbol INU Loans are shipped via UPS or ILDS. FedEx delivery is available upon request at the borrower's expense. Please include your FedEx account number on the request form. OCLC IFM billing is preferred. Invoices are issued with the loan/scan. All payments must be made in US currency or via IFLA vouchers.
